meeting_day_one-start.text: Let the record show that Dr Pink, head of planetary defence, has now joined us
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: magenta

meeting_day_one-start.text: I call this meeting to order
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: magenta

meeting_day_one-start.text: Finally! Can I start? I'll start – I think this moon business is a load of crap!
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: green

meeting_day_one-start.text: I assure you it isn't, Dr Green; Calamitas will collide with our planet in less than three days from now
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: purple

meeting_day_one-start.text: I-in three days? It was just discovered, how is that p-possible...?
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: yellow

meeting_day_one-start.text: Exactly – it isn't possible!
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: green

meeting_day_one-start.text: Hear, hear!
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: red

meeting_day_one-start.text: It's possible because the moon is travelling at a speed previously thought impossible, more than triple anything we've seen before
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: blue

meeting_day_one-start.text: While I agree that it is improbable, there's no use denying reality
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: blue

meeting_day_one-start.text: Indeed – it's happening and we must accept it
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: mint

meeting_day_one-start.text: Enough blathering on! I want to hear about what can be done
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: orange

meeting_day_one-start.text: Dr Pink, what is your solution? How shall we divert the moon's course?
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: orange

meeting_day_one-start.text: Yes, Dr Pink – I'd really like to hear it
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: cyan

meeting_day_one-start.text: Well I don't know about Pink, but from where I'm sitting there's only one feasible solution –
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: blue

meeting_day_one-start.text: Blow it to smithereens!
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: red

meeting_day_one-start.text: May I finish? As I was saying, there's only one solution: alter the moon's trajectory through a transfer of momentum
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: blue

meeting_day_one-start.text: And how the hell would we do that?
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: red

meeting_day_one-start.text: He's proposing that we crash a spacecraft into the moon
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: magenta

meeting_day_one-start.text: Precisely – the recoil caused by ejecting debris should be more than enough to achieve satisfactory results
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: blue

meeting_day_one-start.text: So we're s-saved? I'm not going to d-d...
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: yellow

meeting_day_one-start.text: Where would we procure such a spacecraft, Dr Blue? It would have to be big enough to X Y Z
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: mint

meeting_day_one-start.text: Unfortunately, we have no choice but to use the X Y Z
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: blue

meeting_day_one-start.text: What...? But – the X Y Z is manned by over a hundred of our own! We can't just –
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: orange

meeting_day_one-start.text: Y-yes we can! There's no other way!
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: yellow

meeting_day_one-start.text: I vehemently oppose this proposition. There must be some other appropriate spacecraft
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: mint

meeting_day_one-start.text: I'm afraid there isn't – Yellow is right for once, there really is no other way
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: blue

meeting_day_one-start.text: (It won't make a difference)
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: purple

meeting_day_one-start.text: This is insanity! There's good people on that ship – I will not stand for this!
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: orange

meeting_day_one-start.text: Order, order! Everyone settle down, please
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: magenta

meeting_day_one-start.text: Dr Pink, you're head of this department. You make the call
meeting_day_one-start.speaker: magenta

meeting_day_one-yes.text: But – Dr Pink, you can't be serious!
meeting_day_one-yes.speaker: orange

meeting_day_one-yes.text: Lay off it, Orange. They're giving their lives for the human race, it's an honourable death or whatever
meeting_day_one-yes.speaker: green

meeting_day_one-yes.text: I feel sick to my stomach. This better work
meeting_day_one-yes.speaker: mint

meeting_day_one-yes.text: Oh, it will. Well done Dr Pink
meeting_day_one-yes.speaker: blue

meeting_day_one-no.text: (You have decided to not sacrifice innocent lives)
